feed.title: PowerApps Icon Menu Builder v2 Blog
feed.subtitle: PowerApps Icon Menu Builder v2 Blog

entry.title: V2 Released
entry.summary: Happy to say V2 is now released, please view the updated installation guide here..
entry.content:
Happy to say V2 is now released, please view the updated installation guide here..

Features:

  • Over 45K included Icons
  • Save Favourite Icons
  • Copy PowerFx SVG (URL Encoded and Decoded) and Menu Collection code
  • Download Icons
  • Upload Icons
  • Create and Save Icon Menus
  • WCAG 2.1 Color Contrast Checker

Hope you find it useful!

Download

entry.title: V2 RC2 Released
entry.summary: Second release candidate delivered as a single solution file, also the file size seems to have shrunk by 10MB...Cool..
entry.content:
Second release candidate delivered as a single solution file, also the file size seems to have shrunk by 10MB...Cool..

Import the managed solution, if you don't have the SharePoint Libraries installed use the Flow to create them, then import the solution.

Play the app....

You can view the installation guide here.

entry.title: V2 RC1 Released
entry.summary: First release candidate of V2 is now available at Icon Menu Builder v2 RC1.
entry.content:
First release candidate of V2 is now available at Icon Menu Builder v2 RC1.

This has the same component requirements as v1.

You can view the installation guide here.

entry.title: Welcome

entry.content:
